x-codeSamples.source:
#example from: https://chinlinlee.github.io/Burni/assets/FHIR/fhir-resource-examples/messagedefinition-example.json
curl --location --request POST 'http://burni.example.com/fhir/MessageDefinition \' 
--header 'Content-Type: application/fhir+json' \
--data-raw '{"resourceType":"MessageDefinition","id":"05e10ff4-c654-42bb-9379-613da3eb414e","url":"http://hl7.org/fhir/MessageDefinition/example","name":"EXAMPLE","title":"Message definition base example","status":"draft","experimental":true,"date":"2016-11-09T08:00:00+08:00","publisher":"Health Level Seven, Int'l","contact":[{"telecom":[{"system":"url","value":"http://hl7.org"}]}],"purpose":"Defines a base example for other MessageDefinition instances.","eventCoding":{"system":"http://example.org/fhir/message-events","code":"admin-notify"},"category":"notification","meta":{"versionId":"1","lastUpdated":"2022-02-13T22:30:18.168+08:00"}}'

x-codeSamples.label: cURL
javascript Axios

parameters.name: category
parameters.description: The behavior associated with the message

parameters.name: context-type
parameters.description: A type of use context assigned to the message definition

parameters.name: context-type-quantity
parameters.description: A use context type and quantity- or range-based value assigned to the message definition

parameters.name: context-type-value
parameters.description: A use context type and value assigned to the message definition

parameters.name: date
parameters.description: The message definition publication date

parameters.name: description
parameters.description: The description of the message definition

parameters.name: event
parameters.description: The event that triggers the message or link to the event definition.

parameters.name: focus
parameters.description: A resource that is a permitted focus of the message

parameters.name: identifier
parameters.description: External identifier for the message definition

parameters.name: jurisdiction
parameters.description: Intended jurisdiction for the message definition

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Computationally friendly name of the message definition

parameters.name: parent
parameters.description: A resource that is the parent of the definition

parameters.name: publisher
parameters.description: Name of the publisher of the message definition

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: The current status of the message definition

parameters.name: title
parameters.description: The human-friendly name of the message definition

parameters.name: url
parameters.description: The uri that identifies the message definition

parameters.name: version
parameters.description: The business version of the message definition

resource.name: EXAMPLE
resource.title: Message definition base example
resource.purpose: Defines a base example for other MessageDefinition instances.
